ComicInfo.Title: Holy War
ComicInfo.Summary: Holy War: Thor is wounded by the Crusader and Sif takes him to Asgard to be healed by Odin. Upon his return Thor defeats the Crusader.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:35:06. [Issue ID 37429]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Characters: Mayor Byrne,Peleus [Mr. Polowski],Warriors Three [Fandral,Father William Boylan,Odin,Sif,Thor,Caryn Wise (TV reporter),Hogun],Heimdall,Nurse Stevens,Crusader [Arthur Blackwood]
